question: Who became the first Indian man to win gold at Wushu World Championships?
explanation: Praveen Kumar has become the first Indian man to win gold in the 48kg category at the Â 15th Wushu World Championships. In the final, he beat Russel Diaz of Philippines in the men\'s Sanda event in Shanghai. Wushu is a Chinese martial art which combines full-contact kickboxing, including close-range punches and kicks, with wrestling, takedowns, throws, sweeps and kicks catch.
